channel.title: JQ - Today I Learnt — David Winterbottom

item.title: How to use `jq` to only parse valid JSON lines
item.description: Suppose you have a stream of text comprising JSON and non-JSON lines — e.g:

item.title: How to format JSON into a table with `jq` and `column`
item.description: You can create tabular data from JSON using jq to generate tab-separated output and column to format.

item.title: You can use JQ to build JSON payloads
item.description: It’s possible to use JQ to build JSON payloads as well as filter them.

item.title: About `jq`'s `--slurp` option
item.description: Problem: you want to find the unique values of a key in some JSON Lines input using jq.

item.title: You can use `shuf` to take random samples of lines
